title: [GAMEPLAY] In game bug with Lucian's ultimate.
body: Lucian's ultimate is not doing the 400% damage to minions, it's just doing the normal damage.

replies.body: I don't think it's meant to work like that anymore.
I could kill maybe 2 minions if that with the ult, i'm pretty sure it's bugged man.

> [{quoted}](name=FioraTheExplorer,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qPB9cLi1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-24T10:20:32.808+0000)
>
> I don't think it's meant to work like that anymore.

if it's not, then the tooltip is bugged.

No its actually a bug not intended. They wanted to stop the burst on other champions not his damage to minions. Currently his ultimate wont clear an entire wave. Kills 3-4 tops. 400% isn't working on minions
Nah it's the new patch. Riot loves fucking lucians ult till it does nil dmg lel. But srsly, screw dat bug{{champion:121}}
